name.ja: <ruby>月光舞香姫<rt>ムーンライト・パフューム・ダンサー</rt></ruby>

text.en:
2 "Lunalight" monsters
If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can add 1 "Luna Light Perfume" from your Deck to your hand. You can target 1 other "Lunalight" card you control; return it to the hand/Extra Deck, then you can Special Summon 1 "Lunalight" monster from your hand. You can banish this card from your GY; this turn, monsters your opponent controls lose ATK equal to their own original DEF. You can only use each effect of "Lunalight Perfume Dancer" once per turn.
